snippet.title: Amber Heard's Assistant Exposes Her For Lying | Celebrity Craze
snippet.description:
Amber Heard's Assistant Exposes Her For Lying | Celebrity Craze

Amber Heard has destroyed her own career. She went from being called a hero of the feminist/womanist movement to the most hated woman in Hollywood.

She first accused her former husband Johnny Depp 5 years ago. Then few people doubted her words.

Both fans and celebrities offered their support for Amber while at the same time calling for Johnny Depp to be cancelled for good. Johnny Depp's career took a massive hit at this time and he was removed from several big budget movie roles. 

However over the past several years, evidence against Amber Heard has piled up and Amber Heard has now completely lost the public support she once enjoyed from the public.

The fans and many of Amber’s fellow celebrities are now convinced Amber fabricated her accusations against Johnny Depp and orchestrated an elaborate scheme in an attempt to ruin his career and make a large financial gain.

#AmberHeardApology​ #JohnnyDeppReaction​ #JohnnyAndAmber #johnnydeppamberheard
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC-lZTlG05ETwyjDS1JQCv3w/featured?sub_confirmation=1

Check out other videos:

The REAL REASON Amber Heard Is Lying: https://youtu.be/jH-hynWLX5Q

12 Times Johnny Depp Tried To Warn Us About Amber Heard: https://youtu.be/0TqHCUoJSrA

Johnny Depp Responds To Amber Heard's Apology Video: https://youtu.be/QR6yOQ6BjTs

Johnny Depp Thanks His Supporters For Defending Him: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GWUMe-u9zKE
